description:
Brook`s trickery springs the Straw Hats from their artistic prison, but their failure to cuff the culprit means they`ll need help from a cola-powered cannon to emerge victorious!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!
Combat décisif. Jora contre l`équipage au Chapeau de Paille !
Kessen! Joura vs Mugiwara no Ichimi
Решающий бой! Джора против Пиратов Соломенной Шляпы
معركة حاسمة! جولا ضدّ قراصنة قبّعة القشّ!
決戦! ジョーラVS麦わらの一味
